#Data Visualization

```{r}
library(bookdown)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggplotgui)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

## Plotting TN across all sites, slope and rotation

```{r}
graph_TN_all_sites<- ggplot(DAP_tidy, aes(x = Depth, y = TNperha, colour = SLOPE)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid( . ~ Rotation ) +
  labs(x = 'Depth (cm) ', y = 'TN tons/ha') +
  ggtitle('TN across all sites ') +
  theme_bw()
graph_TN_all_sites
```

![](images/image-2005288338.png)
